Posts.Content: Went to doctors 30 sep with lump on my Breast I have to go for screen, She said appointment should be within 2 weeks. Now 2 weeks and no letter yet Is this normal  Very scared   Maybee nothing but have to talk to someone. Sorry for being a coward at this early stage.  Cass
